title: Allyhealth
description:
VIRTUAL CARE. ANYTIME. ANYWHERE.
AllyHealth is a simple and trusted way to access U.S. board-certified doctors and pediatricians, 24/7/365, by phone or secure video chat, from home or on the go, within minutes. AllyHealth also provides virtual access to therapists, specialists, healthcare advocates, health coaches, and cost transparency & savings tools, right from your phone or tablet.

**AllyHealth is the only platform that seamlessly integrates telehealth services together with your other benefits to deliver a comprehensive, all-in-one solution for all of your healthcare needs, becoming your new front door to your healthcare benefits.**

Depending on your membership level, you may have access to:

TELEMEDICINE / ONLINE MEDICAL VISITS
Doctors can diagnose, treat, and prescribe (if medically necessary), for a wide range of common medical issues, including, but not limited to: bronchitis, sinus & respiratory infections, sore throat, diarrhea, cold/flu, allergies, strep throat, urinary tract infections, pink eye, rashes, migraines, ear infections, and more.

MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES
We also offer online talk therapy and psychiatry visits for treatment and support for a wide variety of behavioral health issues, including but not limited to: depression, anxiety, grief & loss, trauma & PTSD, relationship issues, stress, postpartum depression, bipolar disorder, and more.

HEALTH & WELLNESS COACHING
Our health and wellness coaches are trained to help with a wide range of health, wellness, and chronic conditions. We offer support for things such as weight loss, diabetes, high blood pressure, nutrition coaching, and more, helping you to live a healthier life.

HEALTHCARE ADVOCACY & CONCIERGE
Your “Personal Health Ally” can help you navigate through the complexities of the messy U.S. healthcare system and your insurance plan. Get help with common everyday needs like selecting the right providers, scheduling appointments, reviewing and negotiating medical bills, understanding and managing insurance claims, and more.

COST TRANSPARENCY & SAVINGS TOOLS
Save on your prescriptions with our pharmacy discount program. Have our team of experts review and negotiate your medical bills. Access to lower-cost healthcare services. And more right in the app.

Features & Benefits include:
Medical care within minutes; mental health sessions within as little as 24 hours
Digital benefits wallet to store and view all of your insurance ID cards
Savings & transparency tools
Private and secure
Family coverage
Skip the germ-filled waiting room

NOTE: You must have a company-sponsored membership to use AllyHealth. Some of the above services may not be available, depending on the plan level offered by your company. Check with your employer to see if you are eligible. Member verification and login required.

App Supports
Health and Fitness:
- Nutrition and Weight Management
- Stress Management, Relaxation, Mental Acuity

Medical:
- Diseases and Conditions Management
- Healthcare Services and Management
- Mental and Behavioural Health

Copyright © 2024 AllyHealth LLC. All Rights Reserved.

We treat many patients each day with many different conditions, but you should not use AllyHealth if you are experiencing a medical emergency. AllyHealth may not be available in certain states and is subject to state regulations. AllyHealth is NOT an insurance product or company, and may not be able to substitute for traditional in-person care in every case for every condition. AllyHealth does not guarantee patients will receive a prescription, does not prescribe DEA-controlled substances, and may not prescribe non-therapeutic drugs and certain other drugs that may be harmful because of their potential for abuse.
